data.title: Dolly Parton Imagination Library — Marcella Foundation :: Think Big. Make a Difference.
data.meta_description: Free monthly books for any child in El Dorado County ages 0-5
data.meta_site_name: Marcella Foundation :: Think Big. Make a Difference.
data.text:
Dolly Parton’s Imagination Library inspires a love of reading and ensures children receive new books every month until they turn 5-years-old – building a home library for FREE.

If you are interested in signing up for this program, click the button below to learn more & apply!

FAQs

What is Dolly Parton’s Imagination Library?

Dolly Parton's Imagination Library is a book gifting program that mails FREE high-quality, age-appropriate books to children from birth until their fifth birthday. Now available to all families in El Dorado County in English and Spanish, the Imagination Library helps improve children's reading skills, promotes family bonding time, and fosters a love for reading. After enrolling, a book is delivered that child's home monthly. Books are educational and entertaining, covering a wide range of topics from fairy tales to stories about diversity, friendship, and adventure. By participating in the Imagination Library, children are given the opportunity to build their home library, create lasting memories with their family, and inspire a love of reading that lasts a lifetime!

How much does it cost to participate?

The Imagination Library is FREE, regardless of income. Thanks to local donors, community partners, and the State of California, Dolly Parton's Imagination Library is available, free of cost, to children age birth until their fifth birthday.

Who is eligible?

Any child under five years of age, living in El Dorado County.

How do I enroll my child?

Enrolling is easy, just click here! You'll be asked a few simple registration questions including your address, your child’s date of birth, and a few other items.

Upon successfully completing registration, children will receive one book every month, mailed to your specified address, until they reach their fifth birthday, at which point they are considered a “graduate” of the program.

How do I become an ambassador for Dolly Parton’s Imagination Library in my community?

Are you interested in helping to get more books in to the hand and hearts of children across El Dorado County? Learn how you can become a Community Champion by emailing us at dpil@marcellafoundation.org
